price: 这是因为你所犯的罪行，也因为安拉绝不是亏待众仆人的。
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ بِمَا قَدَّمَتۡ يَدَاكَ وَأَنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَيۡسَ بِظَلَّٰمٖ لِّلۡعَبِيدِ

version.title: Chinese Translation - Mohammed Suleiman
version.description: Translation of the Qur’an meanings into Chinese, translated by Mohammed Makin, reviewed by Mohammed Suleiman with other specialists.

meta.transliteration: dhālika bimā qaddamat yadāka wa-anna al-laha laysa biẓallāmin lil'ʿabīdi
